metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16423 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A double free when handling responses from a smartcard insc_file_set_sec_attr in libopensc/sc.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could beused by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16423` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.19.0-1build1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.19.0-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-1build1').
